title: What are the best examples of sustainable technology in your day-to-day life? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Opening a door or window to increase fresh air, using a broom instead of a vacuum, using a spoon or fork instead of your electric food processor or mixed, walking or riding a bike instead of driving your car, reusing paper towels when possible; reusing and recycling; bags, bottles, and jars; wearing a sweater or long-johns when its cool; buying less/fewer clothes; making do with used clothing; visiting second-hand clothing shops; insulating your windows in the later fall/early winter; donating your used items to a second-hand store rather than throwing them out; creating a compost site, and using it regularly; and teleconferencing instead of being there.
